awards: **Selected to attend a United World College (UWCM)**: Out of 428 applicants from Syria, 14 were chosen in 2016.
**Horizon Foundation Scholar**: Full scholarship (+70K €) to pay for UWCM and 10 year support after graduation
**Maastricht University Scholar**: Full scholarship (+80K €) which is given to only 5 people each year.
**Started writing code at 14 years old**: The first programming language I learned was Pascal
**Until I was 17, I did  many manual labor jobs to help my family**: bakery, print shop, car wash, sales, handyman, and more.

highlights: Implemented high-profile features such as Let's Encrypt integration, merge trains, deploy freezes, DORA 4 metrics, and markdown editor keyboard shortcuts
Pushed Release vision forward through in-depth technical and business analysis

work.summary: I built features that help people release software more quickly, easily, and effectively.
